1.content:
Alan was an average 18-year-old wolf. He liked was all guys liked: sports, video games, girls, etc. Alan tried to get people to notice him and trying to like him but people never saw past his appearance. He was really scrawny for someone his age. He was 5 foot 7 with twigs for arms and legs. He was constantly rejected from everyone in school. No one wanted to be with a tiny guy like him. Alan's dream was for someone to at least look at him and take the time to know him. However, it seemed that dream would never come true.

One night, Alan wasted his time like he always does by watching TV and surfing the Web in his dorm. He felt they were his only escape from the real world. Although he liked doing these things, he would love to escape into the real world and see what it had to offer it for him. The only thing he knew about it was that it was cruel to those that don't look the part. Alan wanted to reject the world for rejecting him but he knew that would be impossible. All of Alan's thoughts and life shortly changed after taking one glimpse of the moon from his window.

Alan raised his head out of boredom, tired of doing the same thing every night. He turned his head to the window and caught a glimpse of the moon. He saw that it was full but there was something more to it. Alan felt compelled by it. He didn't know why, but he simply had to go outside and get a better look at it. He left his dorm and walked to the deserted center of the campus. As he looked at it, Alan couldn't help but admire the full moon that was out that night. It was luminous, round, and beautiful. The majesty of the moon overtook Alan's brain. He also loved how the moonlight was shining against his fur.

Alan stood on campus for several minutes simply adoring the moon with no idea why. He then felt weird all of a sudden. A knot in his stomach appeared without warning. It made him feel nauseous but there was also a hint a euphemism in it. Alan didn't know if he was getting sick or he overwhelmed by the sight. Before Alan could figure it out, he started to get a tingle all over his body. Little did he know his thoughts on life were about to change.
1.title: The compelling glow

11.content:
The moonlight felt good on Alan's body. He didn't know why but he felt more energetic as if he was going through photosynthesis. However, the sensation was short lived as a striking pain enters in every muscle in his body. Alan immediately felt excruciating pain. He squatted down with his hands on the ground trying to relieve himself but to no avail. Alan had no idea what was wrong with him. For one moment, he felt like he was on top of the world and then felt horrible the next. More questions than answers emerged as he looked at his right arm.

As Alan glanced at his arm, he saw it growing in size right before his eyes! His arm grew thicker and thicker in fur and power. Alan noticed the same thing happening to his other arm, but he couldn't enjoy it as another strike of pain appeared. This pain bothered him so much that he screamed till his lungs fell out of his throat.

It was as if Alan was was being overflowed with some sort of power from the moon. He didn't notice but the thickening was happening all over his body. His legs grew over the limit of his pants and split the seems of them. His shirt grew tighter as his chest expanded to extreme proportions. Finally, his biceps grew to the size of soccer balls. All of a sudden, the pain stopped but the questions remained.

Alan finally gets up from the pain still confused over what had just happened. As he stumbles to his feet, he looked at himself in shock. Alan looks at his arms and 6-pack in admiration. He then looked at his legs and saw the damage they did to his pants. Only streams of fabric ran through his newly strong legs with the upper part intact. Alan flexed his biceps to power running through his bulging veins. He didn't know what just happened but he simply loved it.

The only thought that Alan could think of was the amount of respect he would get now. Now that he looked like a teen model, everyone would want to hang out with him. He looked at the time to see the night was still young. Alan wanted to see what he could now in his new body.
11.title: He gains 100 pounds of muscle

111.content:
Alan couldn't stop flexing his biceps to himself. He was simply amazed by the transformation. This new power flowing through him made him feel stronger than ever. Alan also liked how his muscles made him look good too. Alan felt like he could do anything now. The question was what to do.

Then it hit him. Alan remembered there was going to be a party at a frat house that night. Normally, he would stay away from frats because of jocks who would pick on him. But they wouldn't bother him now with his new shape. Alan looked down to see only his upper parts of his pants still intact from his growth. He would have to change first.

Alan thought about his roomate who was on the varsity football team. Surely he would have some spare clothes Alan could use. It only took a couple minutes for him to reach his room, his powerful new legs, made it running a snap, and he could two step the stairs with ease. He rifled through his roommate's dresser, until he sound a plain red T-Shirt that hugged his biceps tightly and showed off his well defined chest and abs and some snug blue jeans. The frat house was on the other side of campus, so it gave him an excuse to really test out how fast he could run now. Alan stepped out of the building into the bright moonlight again and grinned, this was going to be a night he wouldn't forget.

Alan took off in a dead run, flying down the road like an olympic sprinter, it felt amazing, the wind whipped through his fur and he was barely winded. The frat house loomed ahead, getting closer all the time. although Alan was alittle disappointed, he wanted to see just how far he could run, but hanging out at the party, could be just as fun.

The frat house boomed with music, cheers, and popping of beer cans. Alan had no intention of doing anything crazy; he just wanted to see if anyone would check his new body. The wolf walked in to a room packed with dancing students. Alan felt shy at first. He had no idea where to start.

Alan thought he could calm himself down with a soda. As he walked, Alan noticed a few girls staring at him curiously. They never seen a handsome wolf like him before. Obviously this would make Alan thrilled as he always dreamed of girls noticing him. But he was still shy and nervous about where to begin acting socially. He pulled a soda out from one of the coolers that stood on either side of the living room table and went to pull the tab, but applied too much strength to it and he ripped the tab right off. He stared at the tab, for a moment before he slipped it into his pants pocket. A couple of the girls laughed at Alan's confused face when he ripped the tab off, thinking he had been showing off for them. Alan blushed, and felt a little hurt, thinking they were making fun of him rather.

Alan slipped through the crowd into the kitchen with the soda still in hand and set it down on the table. he realized he needed to be a little more careful with how much force he used when doing normal stuff now. Looking at the soda, he wondered whatelse he could do, and he pressed his thumb onto the oval where the tab was supposed to be pressed in and it popped open almost immediately, with almost no resistance.

One wolf girl saw the whole thing. She saw Alan rip off the tab of the soda can and simply push it open. She wanted to talk to him but she too was shy. A lioness and a tigress were with her and encouraged her to talk to him, saying that he looked like a nice guy. What could happen?

The wolf girl saw Alan not drinking alcohol and looking sober. Knowing Alan wasn't a drunkard calmed her nerves and lifted her spirits to talk to him.

"Um...excuse me." Alan looked down to see a cute wolf girl up to his meaty pecs. This was a dream come true for him. A girl was actually talking to him. But what should he say what should he do?
111.title: Goes to a party

1111.content:
Alan blushed a little bit. he'd never had a conversation with a girl at the college before, he'd usually been too afraid or they looked like they would have chewed him up and spit him out. "H-Hi there." the wolf girl blushed and looked down, she was just as embaressed as he was and it gave him a little comfort. "Did you want something? maybe we could talk?" the girl nodded her head gently, slowly tilting her head up, but stopped at his chest, still a little too afraid to look him in the eyes. "Y-Y-Yea.. I c-couldn't help n-notice you s-seemed n-new around here.. No one has s-sen you a-around before." Alan smiled, it wouldn't matter if he had said that he had been around for a while, must much skinnier, he doubted she would believe him and simply nodded. "Yea I guess you could say I'm new." she tiled her head up and started him in the eyes. "I-I was w-w-wonder i-if you w-want to take a walk around c-campus, I could s-show you around." Alan already knew the college campus pretty well, but he didn't want to seem rude and she was really cute. "Sure I'd like that"

The wolf girl felt more comfortable around Alan as they walked around campus. Even though Alan knew the place, he liked being with her. She seemed like a very nice girl. He also enjoyed the clear and quiet night compared to the noisey and crowded party. Alan looked up at the full moon again fueling him with warm power underneath his fur. Alan asked her, "You don't look like a party goer. What's a nice girl like you doing at a frat party?"

"Well," she stuttered, "I'm a bit shy and my friends thought it would be good for me to go. I don't like going to parties like that. They're too noisy and someone's bound to act stupid there."

A girl with good intentions. Alan liked that. But then he remembered, "I'm sorry, I don't think we've been introduced. My name's Alan." Alan rose a paw for a shake. The girl responded, "Alice." Alan grinned, this girl seemed really. Could he ask her out? he didn't know if she would agree. "So Alice I was wondering...." he blushed, wonder if he was making the right choice. Alice looked up at his face. "Alice i wanted to know if... maybe we could.. I don't know go out sometime?" It was Alice's turn to blush and she looked down, suddenly interested in nails on her hand. "I. uh..It's sounds really nice and all.." Alan closed his eyes, waiting for that 'But' to dash his hope, but it didn't come. "Sure. I think a date sounds nice.." her voice grew quiet as the blush in her cheeks grew brighter. Alan didn't know whether to hug her, or to jump up and howl for joy, so he decided to try and play it down. "Great! how about..." Alan frowned. where could he take her? the movies were nice, but so was going out to dinner.
1111.title: Alan talks to her

11113.content:
Alan scratched his head for a moment. He thought about taking her to the movies, but wanted to do something a little more special. then he remembered the arboretum that was close to the campus. He could take her there for a picnic. so he made up his mind. "So there is this arboretum nearby.. maybe we could go have a picnic there?" Alice gave a big grin. "That sounds perfect!" Alan smiled. "how about I meet you there tomorrow at 11? I'll bring the food you can meet me at the front gate." Alice nodded. "I can't wait" Alan stared up at the moon again, knowing this moment wouldn't have even happened without it. "Hey how about we walk back to the party? I'm sure your friends will want to know what happened. or I could walk you back to your dorm if you wanted."

"My friends are probably going to be looking for me," said Alice. "Might as well head back there. I think the party's about over by now." Alan understood and kindly escorted her back to the frat house. As they walked back, Alice hugged on Alan's arm sensing the power brewing within his muscles. She felt a sense of warmth and protection as the frat house's music grew louder and louder.

They stopped at the front door of the house. "Thanks for the walk," said Alan. "I really enjoyed your company." Alice blushed again and said, "To be honest, I didn't think you'd be interested in a girl like me." Alan lifted her muzzle with his paw. "You see a shy girl but I see a kind and beautiful girl." Alice went so red Alan could see it under her fur but made no remark. Alan opened the door for Alice for scurried back in to talk to her friends. a lot of the partygoers had gone, except for a few diehard partiers, or those too drunk to stand. Alan saw Alice talking animatedly with her friends and smiled. He left the party after that. he needed to find some nice clothes or by them when he was out getting food for the picnic, but it didn't matter at the moment. He had his first date ever since coming to college and he looked forward to it. He took off when he was outside the frat house, running across campus, and he let out a howl. It didn't take him long to get back to his dormroom and he let out a laugh. he was too excited to sleep, so he decided to look through his roomate's clothing for something decent he could wear.


Alan found a pair of jeans and a green shirt that looked nice enough and he set it aside for tomorrow. He looked out his window, grinning and he let out a yawn and decided to head to bed. None of his sleeping clothes would fit him, so he decided to simply sleep in his boxers. stripping off his clothes and slipping in under the covers.
11113.title: Take her somewhere else

111131.content:
Alan anxiously held a cooler in paw while waiting at the arboretum gate for Alice. He arrived right on time but she was no where to be found. He grew worried thinking something happened or she stood him up. Alan shook this head getting the crude thoughts out of his head. If something were to happen, Alice would call. Besides, she wasn't the type of girl who would stand someone up, even with her shyness.

"Hey, Alan!" Alan's ears perked to see a young slender wolf girl walking up to him. "Hi Alice!"
"Sorry, I'm a bit late. I got a little lost trying to find the place."
Alan waved his paw dismissively. "Don't worry about it. At least you made it." He then curled his arm in a loop in front of Alice. "Shall we go?" Alice giggled and grab hold of his muscular arm.

It was getting pretty late, but that wasn't gonna stop them from having a wonderful time. Plus it didn't take them long to find a good spot underneath a few trees neither. The female sat patiently in front of her favorite wolf, watching as he was tending to his cooler. "So, what did you bring?"

"Not too much, but nothing too sugary either." Alan pulls out a club sandwich with an olive that was stabbed with a toothpick and hands it over to Alice, "Care for a club sandwich? It's tuna."

Alice grabs the sandwich, "Thanks. It's fine." Alice takes a small, but quick bite of her piece. Alan also pulls out his own sandwich, which was filled with ham instead of tuna. The female wolf suddenly overheas a large chomping noise. Turns out to have come from the big muscular wolf. Turns out Alan has been stuffing his face, as if he was hungry all day. She never really saw the big guy like this before, but she didn't mind, letting out a small chuckle. "Heheh."

Alan takes a big gulp. "Hm? What?"

Alice holds up a napkin to Alan, wiping off some of the mess off his maw. "You're so cute when you engorge yourself."

The big wolf blushes. "Uh... Um, heh..." Alice backs away a bit. "Sorry. Guess I was hungier than I thought."

"It's okay. I said it was cute, didn't I?" That makes the proud wolf blush once again, a little more than before. Alice takes a look out at the soon-to-be night sky, letting the sunset in front of them sink in. She sighs, "Just look at that sunset. Ooh, and it looks like it's going to be a full moon tonight too."

"Yeah..." Alan's ears perked up, "Fu-full moon?!" Alan looked out into the sky. he didn't know what would happen if he was caught out in a full moon. would he grow bigger? would it be painful like last time? Alice had a confused look on her face. "Are you alright Alan? you look a little scared, is something wrong?" Alan looked at Alice and shook his head and remained quiet for a moment before talking. "No i'm fine..." There was no way he could tel her that the moon had made him more muscular, could he? would she even believe him? "well... maybe there is something wrong..." he started, his voice getting a little lower. What if he told her, and the moon came up but nothing happened? would she think he was lying? would she end the date and leave? Alice looked him in th eyes. "It's okay... you don't have to talk about it if you don't want to.."

Then Alan felt it: the same warmth and pain he felt before he grew the first time. He stood up clunching onto his chest gritting his teeth. Alice followed him in concern. "Alan, are you okay?" Alan looked like he was in pain and Alice didn't know what she could do to help. Through Alan's grunts, Alice could see his shirt and jeans seeming to get smaller against him. His fur grew thicker and his muscles swelled to new peaks. Alice gasped as Alan's arms ruptured the sleeves of his shirt and his legs the seems of the jeans.

Alan could feel great power flowing through him but he felt scared not just for Alice; the power felt overwhelming as if he was going to explode. After what felt a long time, Alan stopped to see his shirt and jeans in tears. He also grew to a new height. He looked down to see a surprised Alice. Alan didn't know what to say or do.
111131.title: At the date

1111312.content:
Alice was completely awestruck of the even bigger Alan that kneeled before her in pain. She was scared but she couldn't help but feel a sense of empathy seeing Alan painfully huffing for air. "Are...you okay, Alan?" she asked. Alan was too scared to look up to her. He knew he absolutely terrified her with the ability he has yet to understand. Alan clenched everything he could: his eyes, teeth, and hands.

"Yeah," responded Alan still looking at the ground, "I'm okay." All of a sudden, he felt a cool chill running up his rippled back. Alice stroked his back, squatted to Alan's level, and rose his muzzle. "It's okay. I'm just glad that you're fine." Alan didn't understand. Why was Alice still here when she should be running in fear? "I don't really understand.. you saw what happened and yet here you are..." Alice smiled. "I wouldn't leave someone who needed help, even though i'm a little scared of what happened" Alan gave a sad smile, it wasn't often you met someone so selfless. "Thank you, it means a lot to me, I was sure you would have run away." Alice shook her head. "No, not from you, you are so sweet and gentle" Alan shivered a little, was this was what it felt like to find love? to find someone who could accept you for who you are? Alan felt a warmth blossoming in his chest, but it was different from when he grows, it was tender and felt wonderful. "Alice?" she looked him in the eyes. "Yes?" Alan's heart was beating fast as he worked up the courage to speak. "I was wondering if perhaps you'd want to go out on another date with me? this may seem like a weird time to ask it's just.." Alana didn't get a chance to finish his sentence as Alice pressed a kiss to his lips. "Yes I'd like to go out with you again..although let's make sure not to go out during a full moon ok?" Alan laughed a little relieved and elated.

Alan smiles, and chuckles. "Okay." The bigger wolf gets up and then heads to their picnic setting to grab his basket. He then looks back at Alice, "Well, I guess I'll call you then?"

Alice raises an eyebrow, "Hm? What, you're leaving now?"

Alan's eyes widen a bit, unsure of what to say, "Well...yeah."

Alice walks up to the muscular wolf, "Alan, we've only been here a few hours and you want to leave now?"

The mighty wolf was still just as speechless. "Well...uh..."

"Look Alan, I'll admit this was a big surprise, but that doesn't mean we'll automtically just leave because of it.", Alice explained. "I mean, would you like it if we only spent a few hours on a date?"

"Well...no.", Alan utters. "But, do you think I should even be out here like this?" Alan holds out a hand to show his ripped and tattered clothers.

Alice merely blushes in return, "Mm..." The female wolf quickly turns around, "Oh. Yeah, well...um...I, don't mind. Is, isn't that all that matters right now?"

Alan's eyes rise up, blushing a bit himself. "Oh. Uh, alright." The big wolf sets the basket back down, noticing that there was still enough food to go around for the two.
1111312.title: Alice stays

11113121.content:
Alan and Alice went back to their picnic as if the growth never happened. Alan felt so relieved and happy that Alice stayed. He confidently took a big bite out of another sandwitch he stored in the cooler. Alice also felt relaxed around Alan. She continued eating and enjoying Alan's company but she couldn't stop staring at his bulging and rippling muscles. Every time Alan took a bite of food, Alice could have sworn she saw Alan's chest thicken slightly. Alice like how muscular Alan was before but she was really curious as to how strong he is now.

After Alan finished another sandwitch, Alice spoke up, "So, Alan, with this...change, how strong do you think you are now?" Alan's ears perked and lips curled. He too was curious and was happy to find out with Alice. He curled his arm flexing a bicep and said, "Let's find out!"

The first thing Alan was thinking about was WHAT he could do to show how strong he was. The only thing that was around was their picnic setting and a couple trees. Maybe... Alan stands up, and then takes a light feel out of the tree. It felt pretty hard and well-aged, although Alice was curious to what Alan was doing. "Alan? Is something up with that tree?"

The big wolf turns his head towards his date, putting on a sly smirk, "Um, just checkin' it out." Alan wraps his largely-muscled arms around the tree.

Alice sits up, "Wait, you're not seriously thinking about trying to lift that thing, are you?"

Suddenly, Alan's entire upper body flexes out, his back and arms rippling with so much power the remaining remnants of his shirt stretching right off. The two wolves then heard cracking and trembling from the tree's roots. The noise grew louder and louder as Alan pulled harder. Veins were literally popping out of his fur to feed him the energy to complete the feat.

With a loud growl, the tree rose from the ground in Alan's paws. Both he and Alice stare at the muscles of steel in amazement. However, the feat left Alan too tired to lift it any longer. The moment the tree got into his paws, Alan dropped on the ground.

Alan went back to a still stunned Alice and flexed his arm again charmingly. "How was that?" he said slightly out of breath. Alice didn't say anything. She just ran to Alan to give him the biggest hug she could offer. Alan responded by wrapping the monstrous arms around her so she could feel the warmth and strength of his body. "That was amazing!" said Alice. Alan couldn't but shed a tear. "Thank you. Thank you for giving me a chance."
11113121.title: Alan shows off

111131211.content:
Before they knew it, the two had been hugging a little longer than expected. Alan finally backs away a bit. "Um, so, it's not too late right now. You, wanted to do something else tonight?", Alan asks shyly. Guess he's not as used to being aroung Alice, just yet.

Alice starts to ponder to herself, but she wasn't getting much help staring into Alan's lucious abs. She quickly turns away instead, "Um... Ooh! I know! Maybe...we can clothes shopping?"

At first, the big wolf was unsure about what the passers by might think when a big, muscular wolf just strolls along shopping for clothes. He then takes another look down at his frame, seeing only ripped pants covering his titanic body. "Heh... I guess shopping for bigger clothes won't be so bad."

Alice grabs a firm hold of Alan's palm, "Come on. You'll thank me for this.", she winks. It only took about 15 minutes to reach the shopping district of town, along the way Alan got more than his fair share of looks, some of admiration, some of envy, but it still made Alan feel self conscious about being almost naked. Alice tugged him into one sports clothing shops, there were only a few customers inside and a single cashier and sales representative.

"Can I help you?" asked the horse anthro sales representative. Alice nodded. "We're here to buy a couple new outfits for my boyfriend." Alan stiffened. B-Boyfriend? Alice slipped her hand into his and gave it a light squeeze. The sales representative gave Alan a quick once over, before leading them towards the back of the store where the extra large clothing was set out. There were all kinds of clothes, sweatshirts, sweatpants, spandex shorts, beach wear, and much more lining the walls.

The vast array of clothes overwhelmed Alan. He didn't know where to start looking. Alice still kept her smile while looking at the clothes picturing Alan in all of them. "So," started Alan, "Where do we start?" Alice grabbed a pair of blue sweatpants, black spandex shorts, and extra large muscle shirts. She then handed them to Alan. "Try these on! I'm sure you'll look great!" Alan knew Alice was excited about seeing his rippled body in clothes that'll emphasize it but he was more than happy to give her a show. Alan took the clothes from Alice and said, "Be right back," with a smile.

After a few minutes, Alan walked out of a dressing room and Alice couldn't help but be amazed. Alan wore the spandex short which his tree trunk thighs filled perfectly and a muscle shirt that still defined his pecs and abs. Alan like how they felt. They were not too tight and he felt like he could move freely. With their elastic material, the shirts and pants should withstand another growth outburst if it happens again. Alan felt great and looked great.

Suddenly, the massive wolf was reminded about his growth. Sure, he likes it if Alice didn't mind, but what if it happens again? Would he even be able to turn back to normal. Out of nowhere, Alice runs up to give the worried another big hug, only Alan's worries soon melted away. He sighs, "So, I guess I look good then?"

"No. You don't look good.", She replies blaintly. "You look GREAT!"

Alan's ears perked down. "Oh. She went there." The muscular wolf smiles again, and then lifts up both his shredded arms, making Alice burst out blushing once again. "But, if you like it." Alan picks the female wolf up, and then heads out the door, "Come on."

Suddenly, the horse stops them, "HEY! You need to pay for those!"

Alan felt embarassed, setting Alice back down, "Oh! Right! Sorry..."
111131211.title: Go clothes shopping

choices: Perform a feat of some kind.
1111312111.content:
Alan paid the cashier for the clothes and walked out with the bag of clothes in one hand and hold Alice's hand in his other. "Now that i have some new clothes, what do you want to do? Alice smiled, looking up in the sky. "How about a walk through the park? it'll be good to break those clothes in." Alan nodded. "That sounds great" the park was only about a block away, with his new clothes Alan didn't get as many stares, but he didn't mind it this time, his clothes hugged his body very well showing off his excellent definition

the park was peaceful enough, a couple here, some joggers further off. The path was lit brightly and very easy to follow. As they walked Alice moved closer to Alan. "You know... This wasn't what i was expecting when you asked me out." Alan smiled, "Well how guys can say they grew another couple inches taller and grew more muscled just by looking at the moon?" Alice giggle. "Not many I suppose, It certainly made it interesting." Alan nodded "yea.." They walked in slilence for a little while after that before Alan spoke again. "So.... in the store you called me your boyfriend, what was up with that?"

Alice looked up at him "Well it would have been strange if we went out clothes shopping on our first date... besides wouldn't you like to be my boyfriend?" Alan nodded. "Of course i do, i just didn't know you liked me that much." Alice blushed. "Well...yeah. I'm don't just like because of your muscles. Throughout this whole night, you've been so nice and considerate. I...I never thought I'd meet a nice guy like you." Alan couldn't believe what he was hearing. No one ever said something like that him, much less a girl. "Thank you," Alan responded. "I'd never thought I'd meet a nice girl like you. You may be shy, but I want to help get out your shell." Alan then took out a paw to Alice. "Will you let me do that for you?" Alice blushed completely red with her heart racing. She took his paw and said, "Yes."

Alan smiled to her again and picked her up to his chest like he did at the store. Alice was scared at first by the surprise but relaxed in the warmth and protection of her defender. "Let's go see what else we can find in this park," said Alan to Alice softly.

As the night slowly rolls through, the two lovebirds were staring intently at the starry sky. "It sure looks lovely out tonight, huh?"

"Yeah. Is sure is.", the big wolf responds. He then stops stops in front of a park bench that was shining under a park lamp. "This looks like a nice spot for you to sit."

Alan soflty sits his girlfriend down, although Alice was feeling a tad confused. "For, for me to sit? Why?"

"For the show!", Alan replies happily. "You know this shirt that I'm currently wearing?"

"Yeah. What about it?"

The handsome wolf raises up an extensively thick arm, the sleeve nearly stretching apart around his hardened peak and tricep, "It's actually a tad too tight for me from all the others after all. Wanna see how much it can take?"

"Oh... Okay." As much as Alice loved to see, she was still feeling skeptical about it, "But, I just paid for that shirt..."

"I'll pay you back however much you spent on it."

"YAY!"

Alan started pushing his arm against his shirt. First there was nothing except the veins that ran through his biceps underneath his shirt. Alice was stunned to see so much power trying to escape Alan's body. With a slight growl, Alan heard a slight tear coming from the stretched out sleeve.
1111312111.title: Fancy a Stroll

11113121111.content:
Alan and Alice spent most of the walk holding paws lost in each other's company. Alice felt secure and happy with Alan's kindness and strength while Alan felt bliss and excited with Alice by his side. Alan wrapped his bulging arm around his wolf girl and she enjoyed feeling even more warm with him.

"You are so sweet Alan," said Alice. Alan smiled at her and said, "Well, you're sweet too." Alice giggled slightly and stood on the tip of her pawed feet to give Alan a kiss on the muzzle. This made him feel more warm than the transformation under the full moon. He liked it very much. Alice then gave a yawn. "I think it's time we head on home." Alan nodded. "I think you're right. It's getting kinda late. Let me walk you home."

The two lovebirds started to walk their way back to campus. It was kind of a long way by foot, but Alan didn't mind. If he had to, he'd be happy to carry Alice the rest of the way there. As they were passing a rather large oak tree, a tall figure pops out from behind the tree. "Alright, stop right there!" The two were alerted, and immediately turned around, standing before a tall, but well-built lion holding a swiss army knife. "Alright, you two just gimme yer cash, and no one gets hurt."

Alice was terrified, cuddling up against the big wolf as hard as she could. This in turn enrages Alan a bit on the inside. How dare this guy come from out of nowhere and scare his girlfriend. "Alan..."

Alan wasn't going to let this jerk ruin the rest of their night. He then pushes Alice back a bit, "Just stay back." Alice calls for the large wolf to come back, but he wasn't listening as he walks up to the burglar lion. Upon further inspection of the feline, Alan notices he was just a tad bigger than him, but that wasn't going to stop the angered wolf from ripping him a new one. "You aren't getting a single cent from us, now unless you feel like losing use of your arm or a leg I suggest you back off" Alan emphasized this last part with a deep growl from his throat which sent a ripple across his chest, his muscles tightening in anticipation for the fight. The lion hesistated and there was a flicker of fear in his eyes, he could hear the dead serious tone and knew Alan meant every word of it, he took a hesitent step back and his grip tightened on the knife before he thrust it forward. Alice watched in horror as the knife flew upward toward's Alan's chest and her lungs filled to scream, but it died in her throat when Alan's arm lashed out, grabbing his wrist and bring it to a complete halt just an inch from his chest.

":You shouldn't have done that..." Alan tighten his grasp on the Lion's wrist so hard he heard the cracking and groaning from the bone and the lion let out a howl of pain and dropped the knife. Alan stopped down and picked up the knife and held it up in front of him. "I warned you, now I'm going to give you a small demonstration of what I can do." Alan pressed his thumb roughly against the knife, which bent in half with almost no resistance. The lion began whimpering, which quickly turned to howls of pain as Alan twisted his arm behind his back and pulled until he heard a loud crack inciting a screech of agony. "Now.... you are going to get out of here. You're lucky i didn't do more than bruise the bone and if i ever find out you mug someone else, i will hunt you down, and next time i am going to shatter your arm, do you hear me?!" The lion nodded, shaking in fear. Alan let go of the lion's arm shoving him to the ground and he scampered away giving off a low whine of pain as he cradled his arm.

Alan turned back to Alice who was completely terrified. She had tears running down her muzzle. Alan walked to her and wrapped his muscular arms around her. Alice's breaths slowed as Alan whispered to her, "It's okay. Everything's fine. We're okay." Alice hugged his thick waist and said, "That was so scary...I...I don't..." Alan shushed her and hugged her tighter. "It's okay. I'm sorry that happened. But don't worry. I won't let anything harm you. I will do whatever I can to protect you."

Alice began to calm under Alan's grip. His soft and firm chest comforted her after the horrifying event. Alan let her go thinking she had calmed down. "You alright now?" asked Alan. Alice just nodded still a little shaken. "Come on, let's go home and forget about this whole thing." Alice couldn't agree more. She took Alan's paw again and rushed back to campus.

111131211112.content:
The next morning, Alan woke up really early. Although he had a great night's sleep, he still couldn't bear the thought of Alice's terror on his mind. He quickly slips on a pair of jean shorts that Alice bought for him, and then walks out of his dorm to head to Alice's. Sure Alan was shirtless, but he was more concerned about Alice's well-being. He moved across campus quickly, the first rays of the sunlight felt great against his chest, but he didn't stop to enjoy it, he moved faster and faster, bounding up the steps that lead to her dorm room. he stopped to take a breath and calm himself before he knocked. A very sleepy Alice opened the door, staring at his muscular chest and her face turned a deep shade of red and she looked up into Alan's concerned face. "A-Alan! what are you doing here?" Alan pulled Alice into an emrbace. "I... I couldn't sleep, I kept thinking about what happened how scared you'd been and... it hurt me, I never want to you to be that scared again.." Alice's eyes teared up, she'd never met someone so kind and gentle and who cared so much for her. She buried her face in his chest. "It will be okay, I am not afraid anymore.. and I know you'll be here to protect me."

The couple calmed down a bit. "Sorry for coming so fast, Alice," said Alan. "I just wanted to make sure you were okay."
"Don't worry, I'm fine."
Alan took another deep breath. "Okay, well, I guess I'll head back to my dorm."
"Wait, Alan," Alice stopped his tracks. "I was thinking about taking a morning jog in a little bit. Want to come along with me? I can always use the company." Alan streched a smile at the thought. "Yeah, that sounds cool!."
"Great! Just let me get changed."
"Should I get changed too?"
Alice looked at Alan's rippling chest once more blushing. "No, you look fine for a jog.

After Alan's waiting for five to ten minutes, Alice walked out wearing a sports bra, sport shorts, and sneakers. Despite Alice's clothing being very casual, Alan thought she looked better than ever. "Shall we go?" asked Alice. Alan nodded and flexed his arms playfully to her. "Yep. Let's go.

It wasn't that far away, but they were both currently jogging on route around the campus and into a few neighborhoods nearby. Alan felt kind of odd, not in a bad way, but it seems even after half-an-hour of running, he was just breaking a little sweat. Heck, he wasn't tired at all! Guess he never took good enough notice of his growing body until now, even after their unexpected encounter. Boy, wouldn't want to bring something like that up. "Hey Alan, wait!"

Alan takes a look back, "Oh, what's up?" The next thing he knew, Alice was practically a fourth of a mile away from him, "Holy cow!" They both were at a stop, Alice with her hands on her knees as she tries to catch her breath. "Heh, sorry. Never really noticed how much faster I had gotten."

Alice takes a couple more breaths, and then, "Are you kidding? That's incredible! You should have seen yourself. It was like you were running at a high rate of speed without even breaking a sweat!"

"Eh-heh... Was it, really that impressive?", Alan asked unsurely.

"Okay, I guess I'm just exaggerating a bit.", Alice blushes. "Well, you wanna head back to school?" Alice was about to walk off, but then she notices Alan looking back and forth. "What's up?"

"Oh nothin'.", Alan answered. "No one's around so...", Alan raises an arm up, making the wolfess's eyes grow wide as he flexes it a bit for her, "...How 'bout a quick little show?"

With no shirt to wear, Alan's strength had no limit. He raised his arms to his shoulders and tense them as hard as he could making them swell and throb with power under his fur. He then pushed downwards to make his abs and chest more defined. Alice could have sworn she saw another row of abs form from that flext. Alan then turned around, raised his arms above his head and tensed his legs showing the strength that made him run like an olympic athlete. His back was also showing great definition. Alice had mixed emotions wathcing the show. She enjoyed while trying to contain her blushing.

Alan took a slight bow as a sign he was done. "Thank you," said Alan. "You were a lovely audience." Alice ran up to him to kiss him on the muzzle. "You were a lovely show!" Alan blushed and came up with another idea to charm her even more. Alan scooped Alice up with her head resting in his pecs. "What are you doing?" asked Alice. Alan winked. "Taking you home." Alan began running at the same lightning speeds like before. The two wolves felt the thrill of wind in their face and the joy of being together.
111131211112.title: Run and Play

1111312111121.content:
Alan put down Alice right in front of her dorm room. She still felt exhillerated after such an exciting morning and Alan still had a smile on his muzzle. "Thanks," said Alice, "That was...really awesome!" Alan shrugged his moutainous shoulders. "Thanks. This was fun. I'll see you soon." Alice gave Alan another kiss on his muzzle. "Looking forward to it."

Alan decided to head back to his dorm to find a shirt to wear. Although he loved his scultped chest, he figured he needed to find a shirt so people wouldn't stare as much. He scurried through the plastic bag of clothes Alice gave him and found a decent red T-shirt. Alan put it on and loved how it felt on him, tight but not too tight. He looked at a nearby mirror and saw the shirt hugged his body very well. It showed the slenderness of his waist while emphasizing his powerful pecs. Alan then raised his arms to see the sleeves of his shirt filled out his biceps and triceps very well. The sleeves were stretched but not as if they were going to tear at any moment. Alan felt fantastic in his new shirt and it was time for him to show off to the rest of the world. Alan headed out of his room, class didn't start for another 20 minutes, but he wanted to take a walk around campus and see how many people noticed his new body. It was still pretty warm when he left the dorms, there weren't many people out and around near the dorms, so Alan decided to head down towards the classrooms. he began at a normal walk, enjoying the warmth, around him the few people that were out turned to look at him, most didn't recognize Alan which wasn't very surprising. He got more than his fair share of oogling from several females he passed, but he didn't really pay them any mind, he already had a very sweet girl for a girlfriend.

In the main classrooms area, the student traffic picked up considerably, and more people stopped to stare at the very muscular wolf. Alan couldn't help but blush with pride as people admiried his body. His first was gym, which before would have filled him with dread because of how scrawny he'd been, but with his new body? he wondered what exactly he could do with this new strength. The gym wasn't exactly fancy, it had all the necessities, some weight lifting equipment, sports gear, and a small track that ringed the football field out behind the building. Alan stopped to look at the weight lifting equipment, and he wanted to try it out and see just how much he culd push his body.

The first thing Alan thought about picking up were the dumbbells, which were sitting together on a rack. The room wasn't no gym, but it has a good selection of different weights. The first Alan picks up was a 35-pound weight, and boy did it feel light! Before he grew, he was barely even able to lift this up, or do 5-10 reps at one time. "That's not much of a surprise." He sets the weight back down, and then goes straight to the 50-pounder. It added a little more stress to Alan's arm, but t'weren't no problem at all. "Hmm... Good, but, not good enough." The next weight beside it was a 75-pound one. As soon as the big wolf picks it up, he nearly drops it, "Whoa!" He smirks, "This seems just right."

Just for fun, Alan grabbed the other 75-pound weight and starts doing arm lifts one arm at a time. It was starting to feel really good. It's almost like what he did last night with that tree, and before he knew it, he just finished a set of 30. "Incredible..." He puts the dumbbells back on its rack, and raises his left arm to give it a good pump. "And I'm still not tuckered out too." Alan then does the same with his right arm, watching his bicep peak out thickly. While he did so, he spots a pull-up bar hanging against the wall. "Hey now..." Without a second thought, the excited wolf walks up to the bar. He first wipes off the sweat from his hands on his shirt, and then grabs a firm hold of the bar. As he tenses up his ripped arms, and thickens out his meaty pecs, Alan was picking himself off the ground in no time!

"Holy cow...!", he murmurs to himself. He decides to do it once again, and makes it without too much strain on his body. Alan felt pretty proud, talking in his head as he just kept it up, "I can do this all day if I wanted to!"

Without noticing, someone takes a walk into the room, immediately taking notice of the pumped wolf. "Whoa..." Alan's sensitive ears overheard that, and immediately stopped what he was doing to turn around and see who it was. He saw a buff tiger standing in awe at Alan's physique. The tiger was about the same size and strength as Alan and even he couldn't pull on the bar with the same ease. Alan let go of the bar making the whole floor thump under his muscular weight. He then turned his attention to the tiger.

"Sorry," said Alan, "I guess I got a little carried away." The tiger was still amazed at the wolf. "Dude, you kidding? You were doing awesome! I usually call it quits after 15 reps. You were at least 50!" Alan's ear perked up. "Really? Heh, I guess I lost count." The tiger took out his paw to Alan. "I'm Tobias, by the way, please don't call me Toby." Alan took his paw and responded his name. "You were doing pretty awesome, Alan," said Tobias. "Despite our similar size, it seems like you've been training for a very long time." Alan knew it wasn't true but he didn't want to lie to him. "I do what I can," said Alan vaguely.
"I can tell!"

Alan and Tobias began talking about workout routines, muscles, and pretty much anything else. They seemed to be very friendly towards each other. Alan never thought he'd meet a nice muscular guy like Tobias. People like him would pick on him before his growth. "Say Alan," said Tobias, "I just finished my workout for today, you wanna hang out somewhere?"

"Cool! I'll get ready too. See you at the track!"

Alan stands up once T walked up to him, "Well, I thought there's be a lot of meat under that shirt.", he remarks.

Tobias smirks, raising an arm in an impress bicep flex. "Heh. Gotta stay above tip-top shape as a quarterback." A few girls in the background even screamed at the sight of Tobias's flexed arm.

Alan's eyes grew wide, "Holy cow! You're the football team's quarterback?!"

"Yup!", Tobias smiles proudly, spreading his thick chest a bit. "What, you didn't know?"

"Ya don't say.", the tiger remarked with an eyebrow raised. "Hey, we gotta work out together some time." Alan nodded his head in agreement. "But for now, why don't we see just how fast you are." Alan can tell the tiger was speaking to him as if it were a challenge.

After what seemed forever for the both of them, Alan and Tobias crossed the finish line and collasped in the grass after slowing down. They were both gasping for air. "Who...Who won?" asked Alan. "I...I don't know," huffed Tobias. "You're pretty fast!"
"You too!"
"Wanna call this a tie?"

Alan and Tobias were still huffing air from their run. Alan placed his paw against his giant chest to feel his heart pumping blood wildly to support his godlike body. He then reached to his abs feeling hunger pains. "That was a pretty good warm up!" gasped Tobias while standing. "You up for a bit more?" Alan nodded his muzzle. "I think I'm getting hungry actually. As Alan and Tobias walked through the cafeteria, they got quite their shareof stares, many looks of admiration, others of curiosity seeing Tobias with the "new student". Alan turned to Tobias "anything you want to get in particular? I am starving so I could eat anything" Tobias smiled "I was thinking a nice big breakfast, Eggs, bacon, maybe some toast or some bagels and milk or juice? Gotta keep our bodies strong and full." Alan glanced at some girls who were shyly staring at his rippled arms. Alan gave a slight flex following some girlish giggling. There would be some time for that later; right now, it was time for class.

Before, he wouldn't have a chance with her. Let's see about that. Alan strolled to the girl. "Do you need some help?" he said in a deep voice developed from the change.
